text: Atelodesmis piperita is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1885. It is known from Costa Rica and Mexico.BioLib.cz - Atelodesmis piperita. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1885
title: Atelodesmis piperita
